subject: Basketball
Officiating (Sports)
lead_paragraph: N.B.A. executives and referees are accused of broad misconduct and outright manipulation of game results in the latest court filing by the lawyer for the former referee Tim Donaghy.
snippet: N.B.A. executives and referees are accused of broad misconduct and outright manipulation of game results in the latest court filing by the lawyer for the former referee Tim Donaghy.
